Package compression

Class FileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • compression.FileService
  • public class FileService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle file operations for compression. Provides methods for writing and reading binary data

      • writeInt

        public void writeInt​(int value,
                     int length)
        Writes integer with the predefined length as bits out. Will throw exception if the length is larger than max int length 32
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be written
        length - the amount of bits to be used
